snippet.title: Rhythm - Gameplay [Extreme] [Jaeger - Until Dawn] [Music Game]
snippet.description:
Rhythm Gameplay on Extreme
Song: Jaeger - Until Dawn

Game: https://devbuildstudios.itch.io/rhythm

Rhythm is a small minimalistic 2D Music based Action Game
where you have to avoid Hexagon's flying towards you.
But keep in Mind, this Game is really difficult, but dont panic you can change the Difficulty in the Settings.
You can choose the Song's you want to play.
And you can explore all the Secret Achievements this Game offers.
If you complete an Song there will be an Indication with an Color for the Highest Difficulty you completed this Song.

Played by:
https://www.twitch.tv/behindyoutwitch
